page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: (Continuation of page 14) Then we might go to the swing park or play in the garden. After tea I would read.My little sister Julia goes down with Daddy and has breakfast. Daddy brings tea upstairs for Mummy and Julia plays until Mummy has had breakfast. Daddy mows the lawn and Julia plays with her dolls.After lunch Mummy does the ironing while Julia plays outside. {(Angela)} Last Sunday I got up, went downstairs got washed and dressed and had breakfast.Then I fed the cat, dog and guinea pigs. Then I rode my red bike and when I went indoors I watched television.Then Lisa came downstairs and we went outside with Paul. {(Lydia)
